description: Individual assessment with 4 fortnightly reflections (2-minute videos or 250-word entries) on personal/professional development, followed by a 1,000-word reflection essay analyzing the project experience and feedback.
Group report (1,000 words) outlining project background, methodology, solution results, data analyses, modeling, and visualizations for the industry partner organization.
Individual 4-5 minute presentation to stakeholders with Q&A, covering project outline, proposed solutions, and lessons learned. Assessed individually despite team delivery.
Group 1,000-word plan including team charter, project background, aims, timeline, roles, communication strategy, expected outcomes, and risk management approaches.
